message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1500000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your endeavors or personal pursuits. Considering its exceptional quality and the importance it holds for you, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1400000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true value, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I look forward to discussing this further with you and potentially bringing this valuable asset into your possession.
